reviewText: Bought this because I like the movie, follow the river.

Although Follow the river is not as detailed as the book it was still a good movie and worth the time
Thicker Than Water has been on TV and is always worth watching.
I wanted to get Follow The River as I read the book several years ago.  the movie is close at times but not like the book that is what you are looking for.  The DVD and related Items were great.
